channel.title: Freewriting on Raj Patil
channel.description: Recent content in Freewriting on Raj Patil

item.title: Teh worth of a workd
item.description: Writing is an involved process. A rough overview is as follows: you think of an idea you build upon that idea with what you already know you structure out some initial drafts you run it under a careful eye to scrape out the loopholes you edit it, to the point of satisfaction The problem with that process is the last bullet right there. It makes the worth of a word in the moment diminish than the act of etching something down in stone.
